activities: CASAHL provides software that collects and analyzes corporate customer data about usage, size, and design structures of corporate customers' various data stores. A by-product of this collection effort could be that the following personal information may be collected: User names; user email addresses
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: user names, email addresses, street addresses, phone #s, IP addresses (includes manually processed data)
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities for organization HR data only; American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program) for all other data
